languages.text: The character's INT and WP are increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

traits.locale_text: The character's INT and WP are increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Increases the character's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воля{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллект{/g} персонажа в следующем бою будут увеличены. Это однократный бонус, который исчезнет по завершении боя.

traits.locale_text: The character's Intelligence and Willpower will be increased in the next combat. This is a one-time bonus that disappears after the combat ends.

languages.text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Zekâ{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} niteliklerini artırır. Bu bonus tek seferliktir ve çatışma sona erdiğinde ortadan kalkar.

traits.locale_text: Bir sonraki çatışmada karakterin Zekâ ve İrade niteliklerini artırır. Bu bonus tek seferliktir ve çatışma sona erdiğinde ortadan kalkar.

languages.text: Aumenta la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} del personaje en el siguiente combate. Esta es una bonificación única que desaparece al terminar el combate.

languages.text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}提高。此加成效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

traits.locale_text: 在下一场战斗中，此角色的智力与意志提高。此加成效果为一次性效果，会在战斗结束之后消失。

languages.text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が上昇する。これは1回限定ボーナスで、戦闘終了後に消える。

traits.locale_text: 次の戦闘でキャラクターの知性と意志力が上昇する。これは1回限定ボーナスで、戦闘終了後に消える。
